articles.author: Kana Inagaki
articles.title: Masayoshi Son says SoftBank ready to go on 'counteroffensive' - Financial Times
articles.description: Billionaire chief talks up AI and reveals he had breakdown in October where he questioned his achievements as an entrepreneur
articles.content: SoftBank chief Masayoshi Son has said the company will go on the counteroffensive after nearly three years of asset sales and hoarding cash to resume the technology groups investments in artificial i… [+2699 chars]
